The vpn-instance-capability simple command configures the device to directly calculate routes without detecting routing loops.
The undo vpn-instance-capability command sets the DN bit in the LSAs to be advertised and enables the device to check the DN bit in received summary LSAs. It also enables the device to check the DN bit and route tag in received ASE LSAs and NSSA LSAs to prevent routing loops. The vpn-instance-capability simple command configures the device to directly calculate routes without detecting routing loops. The undo vpn-instance-capability command sets the DN bit in the LSAs to be advertised and enables the device to check the DN bit in received summary LSAs. It also enables the device to check the DN bit and route tag in received ASE LSAs and NSSA LSAs to prevent routing loops. By default, the routing loop detection is enabled.
